Fixed.  The digest authentication header uri field wasn't being set correctly (by httpclient) resulting in the 400 (bad request). A fix / work around was introduced with the 3.0.1 release of httpclient. For the details see http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=38043.  Mylar now uses httpclient 3.0.1.

Other ref: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/mod/mod_auth_digest.html#msie

Unfortunately we don't have IP approval of the 3.0.1 release of httpclient so I'm forced to un-resolve this issue until we have approval (eta January 2007?). Only known work around at present is to disable digest authentication (although this will reduce security).
i'm checking with eclipse.org whether faster approval of httpclient of 3.0.1 will be possible, since the delta between it and 3.0 is so small.
This should be resolved in 0.9.2. If you still find an issue feel free to reopen.
